name: fb-bot
description: this programm is using NodeJS, Postgresql, sequelize ORM, and some dependencies such as moment.

scripts.db:dev: npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:test: NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all && NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
